Changelog
=========


1.0.1 (2009-11-25)
------------------

- Added MANIFEST.in to fix source distribution on pypi.

- Updated readme, acknowledging Holger Krekel as original author after asking
  around on #pypy in irc.


0.1 (2009-11-25)
----------------

- Cleaned up my copy of the original fixeol script and made it
  easy_installable.
